Introducing RESOLVE ‚Äì Rethink Circularity


The launch of RESOLVE is here: an impactful initiative designed to maximize the use of our Group‚Äôs existing processes and products to drive a fully circular ecosystem! 

RESOLVE tackles the challenge of unused non-merchandise items (NMIs)‚Äîincluding POS displays, furniture, d√©cor, shelving, electronics, and more‚Äîby giving them a second life.

Have you ever spotted a VM or furniture item at the office or in-store and thought, "I‚Äôd buy that!"? Now you can! 

To test this concept, we‚Äôre launching an Internal Staff Sale‚Äîan exclusive first-come, first-serve online sale on February 13th via OneChalhoub. Get ready to shop our VM, d√©cor, and furniture items at extremely discounted prices! 

Watch out this week for exclusive access to the internal staff sale and stay tuned for more details and get ready to Rethink Circularity with RESOLVE! üåçüîÑ

<https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=272&user=10620> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/d3da08cd122efca4bd0e40c448ff124d1698031724.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/a9202d48e37975964b3a6c53c075726c1850039823.png> 	

As we step into the new year, setting clear and achievable goals is essential to aligning your personal and professional growth with your career and the Group‚Äôs success.

Join our ‚ÄòGoal Setting & Owning Your Performance‚Äô sessions to learn practical strategies for cultivating a results-driven mindset and setting SMART goals that align with business objectives. Plus, get an exclusive look at this year‚Äôs new feature‚Äîcascading goals‚Äîto drive shared success within your team.

Don‚Äôt miss out‚Äîcalendar invites will be out shortly! 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/d3da08cd122efca4bd0e40c448ff124d1698031724.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/03-3-min.png> 	

Ramadan Reflections with Tryano

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/daea0aab10bfe98c67bc839f0d019f671472319599.gif> 	

As we embrace the Holy Month, we reflect on gratitude, togetherness, and giving‚Äîhonoring traditions, creating memories, and sharing meaningful gifts through the eyes of three families, each celebrating the spirit of the season in their own unique way.

We want your input

Phase 2 of the One Chalhoub rollout is here, and we‚Äôre excited to bring HR features to the platform! Join us on the 12th and 13th of February for 2 virtual sessions to help shape a seamless and user-friendly experience. In these sessions, we invite you to share feedback on HR needs and challenges, review upcoming features, and collaborate on ideas.
